body: this is actually nice and creative idea. also arent this bird supposed to be "nue" from japanese myth?

The thought of a species that relies on other species' females to reproduce like in this story is the ultimate combination of  the impregnation, parasite, cattle and bestiality fetishes. It's also very easy to incorporate ntr in these kinda story settings.
Just too damn hot. Wish there were more like these. (with or without snuff)
This is so fucked up but it makes me so goddamn horny.
And it was at that day that a cat lost to a chicken.....
Damn I'm impressed they managed a serious snuff story with no gore. Not bad, really.
